creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: Outer box is cream colored paper with a brown vertical and horizontal brushed pattern; inner box is wood with inscription on outside and inside of lid; wrapped in tissue; support is tan with blue and gold patterned fabric; image is of black calligraphy with two red chops on LL side
markings: red seals: 字曰子徳 {azana iwaku Shitoku}, 静處 {seisho} [seisho #3]
title: No Affairs
